bibl.title: The Land of Egypt in the New Testament.
bibl.note: Reproduit de: JThS N.S., 17 (1966) p. 70. - At Acts vii.36 (cf. vii.11) γῆ Αἰγύπτου is right and the article with Αἴγυπτος wrong.

bibl.title: G.D. KILPATRICK, The Principles and Practice of New Testament Textual Criticism. Collected Essays

bibl.seg: KILPATRICK G.D., The Land of Egypt in the New Testament.
G.D. KILPATRICK, The Principles and Practice of New Testament Textual Criticism. Collected Essays (Leuven, 1990) pp. 167-168.
Reproduit de: JThS N.S., 17 (1966) p. 70. - At Acts vii.36 (cf. vii.11) γῆ Αἰγύπτου is right and the article with Αἴγυπτος wrong.
